-----Original Message-----
From: nfoscarini <nfoscarini@...>
Reply-To: archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com
To: archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [archive-crawler] Seeding via JMX command line client.
Date: Sun, 14 Jun 2009 19:49:21 -0000



Hi,

I am using a C# application to launch a crawl job using the command line
interface, but I need to included seeds for that job.

Is there a way of providing a seeds.txt file for the job using the JMX
command line tool?

Thanks,
